author: VegeTato
name: MakeItRain
shortDescription: Make an object rain from a selected direction or a selected object.
description: - User can select the rain object.
- User can select to rain object from a selected direction.
- User can set condition to check if the rain object collides with another object.
- User can set action to Stop/Start the rain object.
- User can select object2 to rain object from it on a selected direction.
- User can set an action to stop rain object from moving.
- User can set the rain intensity.
- User can set the rain angle.
- User can set the rain animation after the collision.
- User have the option (On/Off) to delete the rain objects when it's out of screen.

eventsFunctions.description: Make object rain from a selected direction.
eventsFunctions.name: MakeItRain
eventsFunctions.sentence: Use _PARAM1_ as a raining object at a speed of _PARAM4_ and direction _PARAM5_ (respawning in _PARAM6_, timer: _PARAM7_, layer: _PARAM8_, z-order: _PARAM9_, intensity: _PARAM10_, rain angle: _PARAM11_)

events.comment: Fix the bug where 1 rain object is visible and get stuck
Creates 1 rain object at the beginning to trigger the repeat spawn event
The timer speed for rain spawning
Spawn rain object randomly depending on the screen width and height and taking into account the camera boundaries
The rain movment
Remove the rain when its out of the screen

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.supplementaryInformation: ["Top to bottom","Bottom to top","Left to right","Right to left"]

parameters.longDescription:
90, for "Top to bottom".  
-90, for "Bottom to top".  
0, for "Left to right".  
180, for "Right to left".  
You can adjust the angle as you like but keep in mind the rain angle must be related to rain direction.
parameters.name: RainAngle

parameters.description: Delete the rain object when its out of the screen
parameters.longDescription:
(Recommended: Yes)
Setting this option to No might reduce your game performance.
parameters.name: OutOfRange

eventsFunctions.description: Make object rain from another object.
eventsFunctions.name: MakeItRainFromObject
eventsFunctions.sentence: Use _PARAM1_ as a raining object from _PARAM4_ at speed _PARAM5_ and direction _PARAM6_ (respawning in _PARAM7_, timer: _PARAM8_, layer: _PARAM9_, z-order: _PARAM10_, intensity: _PARAM11_, rain angle: _PARAM12_)

events.comment: Creates 1 rain object at the beginning to trigger the repeat spawn event

The timer speed for rain spawning
Spawn rain object randomly depending on the object width and height

events.comment: Pause spawning rain objects
Pause spawning rain objects from another object (cloud)
Resume spawning rain objects
Resume spawning rain objects from another object (cloud)

eventsFunctions.description: Could be used with collision condition.
eventsFunctions.name: StopSingleRain

events.comment: Stop rain object movement

eventsFunctions.description: Change rain animation when it collides with other object.
eventsFunctions.name: RainAnimation
eventsFunctions.sentence: If the rain _PARAM1_ collided with _PARAM2_ change the rain animation to _PARAM3_

events.comment: Change the rain animation when the collision happen
Move the rain back to the surface when the collision happen
Remove the rain when the splash animation finish
Remove the rain when the collision happens with the edge of the other object
Stop the rain movement when the collision happen

parameters.longDescription: You can set the animation to 0 if you don't want or have rain animation (splash).
parameters.name: RainAnimation

parameters.description: Change the rain position to surface when collision happen
parameters.name: Surface

parameters.description: Remove the rain object after its animation finished
parameters.name: RemoveRain

parameters.description: Remove the rain object if it collides with the edge of the other object
parameters.name: Edge

parameters.description: Stop rain movement after the collide with the other object
parameters.name: Stop
